GSP29udnyku5u:4: tadeva tu na paśyāma iti cet- nahyeṣa sthāṇoraparādhaḥ yadenamandho na paśyati /
GSP29udnyku5u:7: [ku.5.602] kṣityādi kartṛpūrvakaṃ kāryatvāditi- na bādho 'syopajīvyatvāt pratibandho na durbalaiḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:28: [ku.5.604] nanu yad buddhimaddhetukaṃ taccharīhetukamiti niyame yaccharīrahetukaṃ na bhavati tad buddhimaddhetukamapi na bhavatīti viryayaniyamopi syāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:29: tathāca pakṣadharmatāpi labhyata iti cenna- gaganādeḥsapakṣabhāgasyāpi sambhavātkevalavyatirekitvānupapatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:38: [ku.5.605] viśeṣavirodhastu viśeṣasiddhau sahopalambhena tadasiddhau mithodharmiparihārānupalambhena nirasto nāśaṅkāmapyadhirohatīti /
GSP29udnyku5u:40: tathāca tatprayuktāmeva vyāptamupajīvetkāryatvasāmānyamiti syāt- na syāt- nahi viśeṣostīti sāmānyamaprayojakam /
GSP29udnyku5u:43: kiṃ nāma (232) sādhakasāmānye sādhyasāmānyamāśritya pravartamāne tadviśeṣaḥsādhyaviśeṣavyāptimāśrayet;
GSP29udnyku5u:48: na tu viśeṣaṃ vihāya kārye karteticenna- kāryaviśeṣaḥ kāraṇaviśeṣe vyavatiṣṭhate;
GSP29udnyku5u:50: kiṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇamātre aṅkuro bīje tadviśeṣo dhānye tadviśeṣaḥśālau tadviśeṣaḥ kalame ityādi bahulaṃ loke?
GSP29udnyku5u:57: tatrākāśādervipakṣāt kiṃ kartṛvyāvṛtteḥ kāryatvavyāvṛttiḥ āhosvitkāraṇamātravyāvṛtteriti sandihyate- tadasat- karturapi kāraṇatvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:65: kāryatvāt karaṇamupādānamasamavāyi nimittaṃ vā buddhyādiṣu na siddhyet /
GSP29udnyku5u:67: tadeva tvasiddhamiti cet- kiṃ paṭādau kuvindādirakāraṇameva kartā?
GSP29udnyku5u:89: na hyasya jñānamicchā prayatno vā vemādīnna vyāpnotīti sambhavati /
GSP29udnyku5u:94: na ca hetutvenaiva tasyāpekṣāstviti vācyam- evaṃ tarhi yat kāryaṃ tatsahetukamiti vyāptiḥ,
GSP29udnyku5u:98: kiñcānityaprayatnapūrvakatvaprayuktāṃ vyāptimupajīvat kāryatvaṃ na buddhimatpūrvakatvena svabhāvapratibaddham /
GSP29udnyku5u:103: tathāhi- sākṣādadhiṣṭhātari sādhye paramāṇvādīnāṃ śarīratvaprasaṅga iti kimidaṃ śarīratvam,
GSP29udnyku5u:117: tasmāt, sākṣātprayatnānadhiṣṭheyatvāt svavyāpāre tadanapekṣatvācceti dvayaṃ sādhyāviśiṣṭam /
GSP29udnyku5u:146: tathāpyekādhiṣṭhitamaparaḥ kimarthamadhitiṣṭhatīti praśne kimuttaramiti cet- hetupraśno 'yam,
GSP29udnyku5u:156: asti tatra vaijātyamiti cet- ihāpi kiñcidbhaviṣyatīti /
GSP29udnyku5u:157: na cākurvataḥ kulālādeḥ kāyasaṅkṣobhādisādhyo bhogaḥsiddhyediti tadarthamasya kartṛtvamīśvaro 'numanyate,
GSP29udnyku5u:162: hetubhūtā buddhirnivattate ithi cenna- udāsīnabuddherapi saṃskāraṃ prati hetutvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:163: kārakaviṣayā buddhirnivartate iti cenna- udāsīnasyāpi kārakaboddhṛtvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:169: cikīrṣāhetubhūto 'nubhavo nivartata iti cenna- kenacinnimittenākurvato 'pi cikīrṣātaddhetubuddhisambhavātat /
GSP29udnyku5u:170: anapekṣakṛtihetucikīrṣākāraṇaṃ buddhirnivartate iti cet- na tarhi buddhimātram /
GSP29udnyku5u:177: [ku.5.613] etena- śarīrasambandhe buddhigatakāryatvavad buddhisambandhe prayatnagatakāryatvamupādhiriti- nirastam /
GSP29udnyku5u:178: yo hi buddhyā śarīravaccharīranivṛttyā buddhinivṛttivadvā prayatnena buddhiṃ buddhinivṛttyā prayatnanivṛttiṃ (vā?)
GSP29udnyku5u:185: tataḥ prayatnādbuddhiḥ tannivṛtteśca prayatnanivṛttiḥ siddhyeti vistṛtamanyatra /
GSP29udnyku5u:186: kāryabuddhinivṛttyā tu kārya eva prayatno nivartate, na nityaḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:187: nitye ca prayatne nityaiva buddhiḥ pravartate, nānityā /
GSP29udnyku5u:203: na hi śākhākampo mātariśvana iti stimitasyāpi syāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:209: tadālīḍhasya hi tadutpattiniścaye dṛśyamadṛśyaṃ vā sarvameva tajjātīyaṃ tadutpattimattayā niścitaṃ bhavati,
GSP29udnyku5u:218: bhaumaṃ sparśavadvegavantañca vinā agnimātrāt pavanamātrādvā dhūmakampau syātām /
GSP29udnyku5u:220: na caivaṃ cetanavyabhicāro 'pi śakyābhidhāna ityalaṃ bālapralāpānāṃ samādhānaiḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:221: [ku.5.617] tadutpatterasiddhāvapi tattadupādhividhūnanena svābhāvikatvasthitau- yadi kartāramatipatya kāryaṃ syāt,
GSP29udnyku5u:224: evañca siddhe pratibandhe na pratibandyādeḥ pratibandyādeḥ kṣudropadravasyāvakāśaḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:227: nanu tasya sarvadā sarvatrāviśeṣe kāryasya sarvadotpattiprasaṅga iti nirapekṣeśvarapakṣe doṣaḥ,
GSP29udnyku5u:228: sāpekṣe upekṣaṇīya evāstviti bālasya pradīpakalikākrīḍayaiva nagaradāhaḥ- tanna- sthemabhājo jagata evākāraṇatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:234: visaṃvadati tu pareṣāṃ vicāram- “viśvataścakṣuruta viśvatomukho viśvatobāhuruta viśvataspāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:235: saṃ bāhubhyāṃ dhamati saṃ patatrairdyāvābhūmī janayan deva ekaḥ” //
GSP29udnyku5u:253: smṛtirapi- “ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥsarvaṃ pravartate” (gītā.10.8) ityādiḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:263: ceṣṭā hi cetanādhiṣṭhānamapekṣata iti cet- atha keyaṃ ceṣṭā nāma?
GSP29udnyku5u:265: prayatnamātrakāraṇiketi vā vivakṣitam- tanna- tasyaiva tatrānupādhitvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:267: iṣṭāniṣṭaprāptiparihāraphalatvamiti cet- kartāraṃ prati, anyaṃ vā?
GSP29udnyku5u:270: śarīrasamavāyikriyātvaṃ taditi cenna- mṛtaśarīrakriyāyā api cetanapūrvakatvaprasakteḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:275: yata unnīyate prayatnapūrvikeyaṃ kriyeti cenna- kriyāmātreṇaiva tadunnayanāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:276: bhoktṛbuddhimatpūrvakatvaṃ yata iti cet- tarhi tadviśrāntatvameva tasya /
GSP29udnyku5u:278: viśeṣasya viśeṣaṃ prati prayojakatayā sāmānyavyāptiṃ pratyavirodhakatvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:281: [ku.5.622] atrāpyāgamasaṃvādaḥ- “yadā sa devo jāgarti tadedaṃ ceṣṭate jagat /
GSP29udnyku5u:282: yadā svapiti śāntātmā tadā sarvaṃ nimīlati” //
GSP29udnyku5u:284: īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhrameva vā” //
GSP29udnyku5u:300: kṣityādi brahmāṇḍaparyantaṃ hi jagat sākṣāt paramparayā vā vidhārakaprayatnādhiṣṭhitaṃ gurutve satyapatanadharmakatvāt viyati vihaṅgamaśarīravat tatsaṃyuktadravyavacca /
GSP29udnyku5u:305: “aśvo varāho vyāghro vānaraḥ kinnaro bhikṣustāpaso vipra” ityādiḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:307: tadbhāvepi prayatnānvayavyatirekānuvidhānena tasyāpi sthitiṃ prati kāraṇatvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:314: “etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi dyāvāpṛthivyau vidhṛte tiṣṭhataḥ” /
GSP29udnyku5u:330: brahmāṇḍādi dvyaṇukaparyantaṃ jagat prayatnavadvināśyaṃ vināśyatvāt pāṭyamānapaṭavat /
GSP29udnyku5u:339: padaśabdenātr.a padyate gamyate vyavahārāṅgamartho 'neneti vṛddhavyavahāra evocyate /
GSP29udnyku5u:360: tatkathamevaṃ syāt- na- śarīrānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyini kārye tasyāpitadvattvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:363: atrāpyāgamaḥ- pitāhamasya jagato mātā dhātā pitāmahaḥ //
GSP29udnyku5u:367: utsīdeyurime lokā na kuryāṃ karma cedaham /
GSP29udnyku5u:369: (gī.3-23,24) etena,“namaḥ kulālebhyaḥ karmārebhya” ityādi yajūṃṣi boddhavyāni /
GSP29udnyku5u:389: manvādi vākye gatatvena virodhācceticenna- anupalabhyamānamūlāntaratve sati mahājanaparigṛhītavākyatvasya tattvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:409: viśeṣasyānyaṃ prati pramāṇāntarāgocarasyāpi tenaiva vaktrā pratipādyamānatvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:413: manaso bahirasvātantryāt- na- cetanasya jñānasyendriyasya manaso vā pakṣīkaraṇe āśrayāsiddheḥ prāgeva prapañcanāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:415: paramāṇvādayo na kasyacit pratyakṣāḥ tatsāmagrīrahitatvāditi cenna- draṣṭāraṃ pratyasiddheḥ;
GSP29udnyku5u:421: pramāṇavākyasya sata iti cenna- praṇetṛpramāṇāntaragocarārthatvasya sādhyānupravośāt;
GSP29udnyku5u:428: astvevam, na tu teṣā mithomūlamūlibhāva iti cenna- uktottaratvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:432: na ca tasya paramāṇuparimāṇaṃ dvyaṇukaparimāṇaṃ vā kāraṇam;
GSP29udnyku5u:439: aṇutvameva mahadārambhe viśeṣa ityapi na yuktam;
GSP29udnyku5u:443: evaṃ sati ko doṣa iti cet- paramāṇukāryasya mahattvaprasaṅgaḥ;
GSP29udnyku5u:446: aṇuna eva tāratamyābhyupagamastu saṅkhyāmavadhīrya na syāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:447: astu mahadārambha eva tribhiriti cenna- mahataḥ kāryasya kāryadravyārambhatvaniyamāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:456: anyathā apekṣābuddherabhāvāt saṅkhyānutpattau tadgataparimāṇānutpāde 'parimitasya dravyasyānārambhakatvāttryaṇukānutpattau viśvānutpattiprasaṅgaḥ
GSP29udnyku5u:461: kṛtamapekṣābuddhyeti cenna- astu tata eva sarvam,
GSP29udnyku5u:467: bhūtārthasya tu yadyapi nāhatya pravartakatvaṃ nivartakatvaṃ vā,
GSP29udnyku5u:474: ākāṅkṣādimattve sati cānvayaśaktiḥ padānāṃ padārthānāṃ vā vākyam;
GSP29udnyku5u:477: tadeva paraṃ sādhyaṃ pratipādyaṃ prayojanamuddeśyaṃ vā yasya,
GSP29udnyku5u:485: praśastaninditasvārthapratipādanadvāreṇa pravṛttinivṛttirūpaṃ sādhyaṃ paramucyate iti cenna- gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra tīrasyāpravṛttinivṛttirūpasyāsādhyasyāpi paratvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:486: tīraviṣaye pravṛttinivṛttī sādhye iti tīrasyāpi paratvamiti cenna- svarūpākhyānamātreṇāpi paryavasānāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:489: padaśaktisaṃsargaśaktī vinā svārthāvinābhāvena pratipādyaṃ paramucyate ityapi na sāmapratam- na hi yad yacchabdārthāvinābhūtaṃ tatra tatra tātparyaṃ
GSP29udnyku5u:491: tadā hi gaṅgāyāṃ jalamityādyapi tīraparaṃ syāt;
GSP29udnyku5u:493: mukhye bādhake sati tattathā syāditi cet- na- tasminnasatyapi bhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:494: tad yathā- “gaccha gacchasi cet kānta panthānaḥsantu te śivāḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:495: mamāpi janma tatraiva bhūyād yatra gato bhavān” iti mukhyārthābādhane 'pi vāraṇe tātparyam /
GSP29udnyku5u:498: tad yathā, mañcāḥ krośantīti puruṣe tātparyam /
GSP29udnyku5u:508: tadarthasādhyatvenāpekṣāniyama iti cenna- kāryajñāpyabhedena sādhyasya bahuvidhatve bhinnatātparyatayā vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:511: tathāceha pradeśe dhūmodgama ityabhihite tātparyataḥ ko vākyārtho bhavet;
GSP29udnyku5u:524: sa coddeśo vyavasāyo 'dhikāro 'bhiprāyo bhāva āśaya ityanarthāntaramiti tadādhārapraṇetṛpuruṣadhaureyasiddhiḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:525: tathā ca prayogaḥ- vaidikāni praśaṃsāvākyāni upādānābhiprāyapūrvakāṇi praśaṃsāvākyatvāt pariṇatisurasamāmraphalamityādilokavākyavaditi /
GSP29udnyku5u:526: evaṃ nindāvākyāni hānābhiprāyapūrvakāṇi nindāvākyatvāt pariṇativirasaṃ panasaphalamityādivākyavat /
GSP29udnyku5u:532: na ca pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte ityatra rātrau bhuṅkta iti vākyaśeṣo 'sti;
GSP29udnyku5u:550: sa ca śrutādhītāvadhṛtasmṛtasāṅgopāṅgavedārthastadviparīto vā na sarvajñādanyaḥ sambhavati /
GSP29udnyku5u:555: atrāpi prayogaḥ- vedāḥ kadācit sarvavedārthavidvyākhyātāḥ, anuṣṭhātṛ(254)
GSP29udnyku5u:561: vedavadvedārthānuṣṭhānamapyanādīti cenna- taddhi svatantraṃ vā vedārthabodhatantraṃ vā /
GSP29udnyku5u:569: avigānena śrutismṛtītihāseṣu prayujyamānatvāt ghaṭādipadavaditi sānāsyataḥ siddheḥ,
GSP29udnyku5u:575: tad yathā īśvarapraṇidhānamupakramya śrūyate- sarvajñatā tṛptiranādibodhaḥ svatantratā nityamaluptaśaktiḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:577: evambhūtor'thaḥ pramāṇabādhita iti cenna- prāgeva pratiṣedhāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:578: tathāpi na tatra pramāṇamastīti cet- svarge astīti kā śraddhā?
GSP29udnyku5u:580: yājñikapravṛttyanyathānupapatyā tathaiva tadityavadhāryate iti cenna- itaretarāśrayaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:581: avadhṛte hi svargarūpe tatra pravṛttiḥ pravṛttyanyathānupapattyā ca tadavadhāraṇamiti /
GSP29udnyku5u:583: viśiṣṭādṛṣṭavaśāt kadācit kasyacidevaṃ vidhamapi sukhaṃ syāditi nāsti virodhaḥ;
GSP29udnyku5u:585: atrāpi prayogaḥ- yaḥśabdo yatra vṛddhairasati vṛttyantare pyujyate sa tasya vācakaḥ,
GSP29udnyku5u:600: na ca yo yadoccārayati vaidikamahaṃ śabdam,
GSP29udnyku5u:601: sa eva tadā tasyārtha iti yuktam /
GSP29udnyku5u:608: api tu vaktaiveti sthite prayujyate vede asmacchabdaḥ svaprayoktṛvacanaḥ asmacchabdatvāllokavaditi /
GSP29udnyku5u:609: evamanye 'pi yaḥ kaḥ sa ityādi śabdā draṣṭavyāḥ,
GSP29udnyku5u:616: na ca jijñāsāsaṃśayādayaḥ sarvajñe pratiṣiddhā iti yuktam /
GSP29udnyku5u:619: etena dhigaho bata hantetyādayo nipātā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:621: liṅgādipratyayā hi puruṣadhaureyaniyogārthā bhavantastaṃ prati pādayanti /
GSP29udnyku5u:625: [ku.5.646] pravṛttiḥ khalu vidhikāryā satī na tāvatkāyaparispandamātram,
GSP29udnyku5u:636: pravṛttihetoricchāyā jñānayonitvāt jñānamanutpādyatadutpādanasyāśakyatvāt tasya ca nirālambanasyānutpatteḥ;
GSP29udnyku5u:640: sorthaviśeṣastajjñāpako vār'thaviśeṣo vidhiḥ preraṇā pravartanā niyuktirniyoga upadeśa ityanarthāntaramiti sthite vicāryate- sa hi kartṛdharmo vā syāt,
GSP29udnyku5u:650: [ku.5.649] nanu na sarvatra prayatna eva pratyayārthaḥ;
GSP29udnyku5u:653: tato liṅgādivācca eva prayatna iti- na- kuryādityatrāpi tulyatvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:655: ṅgatāpannasya pratyayārthatvānna tulyatvamiti cet- na- tathāpi tulyatvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:658: tatra dvitīyasṅkhyecchādikalpane karoti prayatate ityādāvapi tathā syāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:660: ratho gacchatītyādau tadasambhave kā gatiriti cet- tantavaḥ paṭaṃ kurvantītyatra yā /
GSP29udnyku5u:663: ākhyātamātrasya tu na tatheti cet- na- vivaraṇāderapi vyutpatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:675: na tvanyeneti kuta iti cet- niyamena tathā vivaraṇāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:678: syādetat- yasya kasyacit- phalaṃ pratyanukūlatāpattimātrameva karotyarthaḥ,
GSP29udnyku5u:686: bādhake kalpanīyā iti cet- atrocyate-[ku.5.652] kṛtākṛtavibhāgena kartṛrūpavyavasthayā /
GSP29udnyku5u:689: yatnapūrvakatva.ṃ hi pratisandhāya ghaṭādau kṛta iti vyavahārāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:690: hetusattvapratisandhāne 'pi yatnapūrvakatvapratisandhānavidhurāṇāmaṅkurādau tadavyavahārāt karotyartho yatna eva tāvadavasīyate /
GSP29udnyku5u:693: tena ca sarvamākhyātapadaṃ vivriyate iti sarvatra sa evārtha iti nirṇayaḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:694: tathāca samudite pravṛttaṃ padaṃ tadekadeśe 'pi prayujyate,
GSP29udnyku5u:697: prathame puruṣe jānāti icchati prayatate adhyavasyati śete saṃśete ityādayaśca gauṇārthā evācetaneṣu /
GSP29udnyku5u:698: na ca vṛttyantareṇāpi prayogasambhave śaktikalpanā yuktā;
GSP29udnyku5u:718: “svavyāpāre ca kartṛtvaṃ sarvatraivāsti kārake” iti nyāyena karaṇādivilopaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:721: asti hi kāñcit kriyāmuddiśya pravartamānānāṃ kārakāṇāmavāntaravyāpārayogaḥ,
GSP29udnyku5u:722: natvavāntaravyāpārārthameva teṣāṃ pravṛttiriti cet- tarhi tadapekṣayaiva kartṛkarmādivyavahāraviśeṣaniyame kiṃ kāraṇamiti cintyatām /
GSP29udnyku5u:723: svātantryāditi cet- nanu tadeva kimanyat prayatnādisamavāyāditi vivicyābhidhīyatāmiti /
GSP29udnyku5u:726: prayatnastvākṣepato lapsyate iti cenna- bhāvanaiva hi yatnātmā sarvatrākhyātagocaraḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:740: tatra na bhaviṣyatīti cet- na- pūrvāparībhūtabhāvanānubhavasyāviśeṣāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:749: odanamityādeḥ kārakapadatvāt tasya ca kriyopahitatvāttenābhidhānamākṣepo vā /
GSP29udnyku5u:750: kathamanyathā odanamityukte kiṃ bhuṅkte pacati veti viśeṣākāṅkṣeti cet- na- pacatītyukte kimodanaṃ temanaṃ veti viśeṣākāṅkṣādarśanāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:755: tadanabhidhāne hi saṅkhyeyamātramākṣipya saṅkhyā kathaṃ kartāramanviyāt,
GSP29udnyku5u:757: śākasūpau pacati śākasūpaudanān pacatītyādau virodhanirastā saṅkhyā caitra iti kartāramaviruddhamanugacchatīti cet- caitra odanaṃ pacatītyatrakā gatiḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:760: caitrābhyāṃ caitrairiti virodhanirastā sūpa ityaviruddhaṃ karma samanukrāmatīti cet /
GSP29udnyku5u:761: caitramaitrābhyāṃ pākasūpau pacyete ityatra kā gatiḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:762: anyatra nirṇītenārthena vyavahāra iti cenna- pacatītyādāvapi tathābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:765: ātmanepadaparasmaipadābhyāṃ viśeṣa iti cenna- pacyate pacate pakṣyate ityādau viplavaprasaṅgāditi /
GSP29udnyku5u:767: tad yathā, bhūyate supyate ityādau / na
GSP29udnyku5u:768: hi tatra kartrā karmaṇā vānyenaiva vā kenacidanvayaḥ,
GSP29udnyku5u:772: ko hisupyate svapitītyanayoḥ kartrākṣepaṃ prati viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:778: iti nyāyena kartāramevāśrayate iti niyamaḥ- na- viparyyayaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:783: yastu pratyayo na tatrotpannastadabhihitā saṅkhyā tenaiva nyāyena karmaiva samāśrayediti niyamopapatteḥ tasmānmatikardamamapahāya yathānuśāsanameva gṛhyate iti prāptam /
GSP29udnyku5u:784: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate- [ku.5.657] ākṣepalabhye saṅkhyeye nābhidhānasya kalpanā /
GSP29udnyku5u:796: tataḥ prathamānirdiṣṭenaiva bhāvanānvīyate iti tasyānvayayogyatāniyamāt saṅkhyāpi tadanugāminī tenaivānvīyate iti nāti prasaṅgaḥ nañarthavat
GSP29udnyku5u:797: yathā hi caitro na brāhmaṇo na (259)
GSP29udnyku5u:798: gauro na spandate na kuṇḍalītyādau viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasamabhivyāhāraviśeṣe 'pi nañā tadanabhidhānāviśeṣe 'pi nañarthasya viśeṣaṇāṃśairevānvayaḥ na viśeṣyāṃśena /
GSP29udnyku5u:809: kaṭaṃ kaṭenetyādi tu kārakatayaiva phalasamanvitaṃ na vyāpārāntaramapekṣate iti nirākāṅkṣamiti /
GSP29udnyku5u:817: [ku.5.658] syādetat- kimiti na prayujyate kaṭaḥ karoti caitramityādi,
GSP29udnyku5u:821: na ca kaṭasya caitraṃ pratibhāvakatvam, viryayāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:823: prayujyatāṃ tarhi kaṭaḥ karoti caitra ityādi- na- nityasandigdhatvena vākyārthāsamarpakatvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:826: evaṃ devadattaḥ kriyate kaṭamiti vyajyatāṃ dvitīyayeti cet- na- aprayogāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:829: na hi gārgikayeti padaṃ sādhviti ślāghābhidhāyipadasannidhimanapekṣya prayujyate /
GSP29udnyku5u:830: tasya tadupādhinaiva vihitatvāditi cet- etadeva kutaḥ?
GSP29udnyku5u:834: [ku.5.659] imameva viśeṣamurarīkṛtyānabhihitādhikārānuśāsanena hyetāvān parāmarśaḥsarveṣāṃ hṛdi padamādadhātītyabhidhānānabhidhānavibhāga eva vyutpādanadaśāyāṃ peśala iti /
GSP29udnyku5u:837: kālatrayāparāmṛṣṭā liṅārtha iti cet- na yatnapadena samānārthatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:838: viṣayoparāgānuparāgābhyāṃ viśeṣa iti cenna- yāgayatna ityanena paryāyatāpatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:839: kartṛsaṅkhyābhidhānānabhidhānābhyāṃ viśeṣa iti cenna- yāgayatnavānityanena sāmyāpatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:840: iṣṭa evāyamartha iti cenna- ito vatsaraśatenāpyapravṛtteḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:841: phalasamabhivyāhārābhāvānna pravarttate iti cenna- svargakāmo yāgayatnavānityato 'pyapravṛtteḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:846: [ku.5.661] na ca sāpi pratītā yatnajananī- yena saiva vidhyartha ityanugamyatām- apitu sattayā /
GSP29udnyku5u:847: na ca liṅaḥ śrutikāle sā satī /
GSP29udnyku5u:859: na ca liṅaḥ śrutikāle sā satītyuktam /
GSP29udnyku5u:860: phalecchā tu nisargavāhitayā satyapi na prayatnaṃ prati hetuḥ;
GSP29udnyku5u:868: tadā hi yajetetyasyaiva yāgakartā svargakāma ityarthaḥsyāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:871: hetuphalabhāva eva niyāmaka iti cenna- ajñātasya tasya niyāmakatve liṅaṃ vināpi svargecchāto yāge pravṛttiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:872: jñātasya tu tatsādhanatvasya niyāmakatve tadicchaiva tatra pravartayatuḥ yo yatkāmayate sa tatsādhanamapi kāmayata eveti niyamāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:878: svasambandhitayā tadavagamastathā na tu sāmānyata iti cenna- prathamapuruṣeṇa tadanabhidhāne tasyāvidhyarthatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:892: na tu jñāta iti nāsau vidhiḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:914: adūraviprakarṣeṇa kāryatvenopanītenāpūrvatvena nimittenāpūrve pravartate liṅiti yuktam /
GSP29udnyku5u:915: tatrobhayorapi pratīyamānatvena sandehe kalpanāgauravapuraskāreṇa pṛthivītva eva saṅgativiśrānterupapatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:918: tadupalakṣitaśca yāgo vā yatno vānyo vā śabdetarapramāṇagocaro nādhikāriviśeṣaṇasvargasādhanasamarthaḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:921: yo liṅādipravṛttigocara iti kimanupapannimiti cet- na- (264)
GSP29udnyku5u:931: na hi yuktisahasrairapi avidite saṅgatigraho 'viditasaṅgatirvā śabdaḥ pravartate iti /
GSP29udnyku5u:935: kiñcāpūrvatve pravṛttinimitte kalpyamāne laukikī liṅanarthikā prasajyeta /
GSP29udnyku5u:963: yatkartavyaṃ tadiṣṭābhyupāya iti vyāpterityapi na yuktam;
GSP29udnyku5u:966: phalaṃ vihāyeti cet- tadeva kimuktaṃ syāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:967: iṣṭaṃ svabhāvata iti cet- tarhi tato 'nyadaniṣṭaṃ syāt,
GSP29udnyku5u:969: tatsādhanamiti cet- tatsādhanatve satīti sādhyāviśiṣṭaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
GSP29udnyku5u:971: tato nūnamiṣṭasādhanamiti sādhanārtha iti cenna- svabhāvato nedamiṣṭamityasiddheḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:1019: astu tarhi putreṇa hate brahmaṇi ciradhvastasya pitustamavāntaravyāpārīkṛtya kartṛtvam /
GSP29udnyku5u:1020: tathāca lokayātrāviplava iti cet- na- satyapi sute kadācittadakaraṇāt tasminnasatyapi kadācitkāraṇādanirvāhakatayā tasya vyāpāratvāyogāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:1021: yaṃ janayitvaiva hi yaṃ prati yasya pūrvabhāvanirvāhaḥ sa eva taṃ prati tasya vyāpāro nāparaḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:1023: tasya hyanvayavyatirekānuvidhāne siddhe tadanyathānupapatyā saṃskāraḥ kalpyate,
GSP29udnyku5u:1025: na cedevam, tavāpi brahmabhiduraśaravimokasamasamayahatasya hantṛtvaṃ na syāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:1028: [ku.5.668] astu tarhi kriyādharma eva kāryatvaṃ vidhiḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:1030: tataḥ kuryāmiti saṅkalpya pravartate iti cet- na- kartavyaṃ mayeti kṛtyadhyavasāyārtho vā syāt,
GSP29udnyku5u:1037: tadetat kartavyatāyāṃ jātāyāṃ pravartate iti vastusthitau bhrāntairjñātāyāmiti gṛhītam /
GSP29udnyku5u:1045: [ku.5.669] astu tarhi karaṇadharmaḥ- na- karaṇaṃ hi śabdaḥ,
GSP29udnyku5u:1058: na ca vilakṣaṇaiva sā liṅo viṣayaḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:1064: anyasya sarvasya niṣedhāditi cenna- pravṛttihetuttvaniṣedhasya tulyatvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:1067: “pravṛttyanyathānupapattisiddhe vyutpatti'rityapi vārtam- nahi pravṛttihetuḥ kaścidastīti pravartate /
GSP29udnyku5u:1069: sarvo hi mayā kriyamāṇametanmama samīhitaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti pratisandhatte,
GSP29udnyku5u:1075: na ca vācyam evañcet varaṃ kartavyataivāstu,
GSP29udnyku5u:1077: kṛtamiṣṭasādhanatayeti- yathā hi neṣṭasādhanatāmātraṃ pratītya pravartate,
GSP29udnyku5u:1083: [ku.5.671] karaṇasyeṣṭasādhanatābhidhāne jyotiṣṭomeneti tṛtīyayā na bhavitavyamiti tu deśyamavaiyākaraṇasyāvadhīraṇīyameva /
GSP29udnyku5u:1090: na cātaḥ saṅkalpātmā pravṛttirastīti deśyam- tatra samutkaṭaphalābhilāṣasya samarthasya tatsādhanatāvahame 'pi na (270)
GSP29udnyku5u:1099: evañca sati sā nābhidhīyate ityeva nirṇayaḥ- hetutvādanumānācca madhyamādau viyogataḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:1101: [ku.5.674] tathāhi- agnikāmo dāruṇī mathnīyāditi śrutvā kuta ityukte vaktāro vadanti,
GSP29udnyku5u:1104: tarati brahmahatyāṃ yo 'śvamedhena yajate ityādāviṣṭābhyupāyatāyāmevāvagatāyāmanumimate tāntrikāḥ yat,
GSP29udnyku5u:1107: tadyathā- “andhaṃ tamaḥ praviśanti ye ke cātmahano janāḥ” ityataḥ nātmānaṃ hanyāditi /
GSP29udnyku5u:1111: kintutatpratipatteranantaraṃ yo 'sya saṅkalpaḥ kuryāmiti, sa eva /
GSP29udnyku5u:1124: na hanyāt- hananabhāvanā nābhidhīyata iti vākyārtho vyāghātānnirastaḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:1135: nāstītyartha iti tu nirātaṅkaṃ dṛṣṭārthinaṃ pravartayedeveti sādhu śāstrārthaḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:1136: ahananenāpūrvaṃ bhāvayediti tvaśakyaṃ kāraṇasyānāditvena kāryasyāpi tathābhāvaprasaṅgāt,
GSP29udnyku5u:1145: nāprasaktamiti cet- na vai kiñcidiha pratiṣidhyate;
GSP29udnyku5u:1149: kiñca na hanyāditi ahananenāpūrvasya kartavyatāpratyayo jāto vedāt;
GSP29udnyku5u:1151: niṣphalācca kāryādapekṣitaphalaṅgarīya iti nyāyena hanyādevetyaho vedavyākhyākauśalamāstikyābhimānino mīmāṃsakadurdurūṭasya (272) /
GSP29udnyku5u:1153: na hanyāt- na hananabhāvanā iṣṭābhyupāya iti vākyārthaḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:1155: na hīṣṭasādhanaṃ yanna bhavati tadavaśyamaniṣṭasādhanaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP29udnyku5u:1159: tena vede 'pyanumāsyate” ityapi na sādhīyaḥ- pratiṣedhārthasyaiva cintyamānatvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:1160: na hi kartavyatvasyeṣṭasādhanatvasya bhāvanāyā vābhāvaḥ pratipādayituṃ śakyate;
GSP29udnyku5u:1165: na vidhau paraḥ śabdārtha iti vacanāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:1166: tathāpi niṣedhe tathā bhaviṣyatīti cenna- avinābhāvataduddeśapravṛttyorabhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:1184: viṣaṃ na bhakṣayedityasya tu viṣabhakṣaṇagocarā pravṛttirmama neṣṭetyarthaḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:1191: va putrādeḥ krīḍā- kardamaviṣabhakṣaṇādiviṣaya iti vyāpteḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:1195: tadastitve 'pi pramāṇaṃ nāstīti cet- mā bhūdanyat;
GSP29udnyku5u:1196: vidhireva tāvat garbha iva puṃyoge pramāṇaṃ śruti kumāryāḥ;
GSP29udnyku5u:1199: ” ya eva laukikāsta eva vaidikāsta eva caiṣāmarthā” iti viplaveta /
GSP29udnyku5u:1203: kṛtaṃ svatantreṇa vaktrā parameśvareṇeti cet- na- teṣāmanuvaktṛtayābhyāsābhiprāyamātreṇa pravṛtteḥ śukādivat tathāvidhābhiprāyābhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:1206: [ku.5.680] śruteḥ khalvapi- kṛtsna eva hi vedo 'yaṃ parameśvaragocaraḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:1217: siddhārthatayā na te pramāṇamiti cenna- taddhetu(toḥ)
GSP29udnyku5u:1223: ata eva tatra tasya smārakatvamityapi mithyā /
GSP29udnyku5u:1224: tatpratipādakatve 'pi na tatra tātparyamiti cet- svārthāparityāge (gena?)
GSP29udnyku5u:1229: thaḥ kvacit dṛṣṭa iti cet- svargādayo 'pi tathā /
GSP29udnyku5u:1230: tanmithyātvetadarthināmapravṛttau vidhānānarthakyaprasaṅga iti cet- ihāpi tadupāsanāvidhānānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29udnyku5u:1231: tanmithyātve hi sālokyasāyujyādiphalamithyātve kaḥ prekṣāvāṃstamupāsīteti tulyamiti /
GSP29udnyku5u:1254: kati cānādau saṃsāre prakṛṣṭāḥ pravaktāra iti ko niyāmaka iti /
GSP29udnyku5u:1257: abhyupagame vā sa evāsmākaṃ vedakāra iti,
GSP29udnyku5u:1261: tadadhyeyā tadanuṣṭheyārthā ca śākhā tatsamākhyayā vpapadiśyate iti kimanupapannam- na- kṣatriyāderapi tatraivādhikārāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:1270: idānīmayaṃ viplavate iti cet- viplava eva tarhi sarvadā,
GSP29udnyku5u:1274: [ku.5.685] sa evaṃ bhagavān śruto 'numitaśca kaiścit sākṣādapi dṛścate prameyatvādergha(tvāt gha)ṭavat /
GSP29udnyku5u:1276: sā hi bahirindriyagarbhamanogarbhā vā tatra na sambhavati;
GSP29udnyku5u:1286: smṛtiviparyāso 'sāviti cet- yadi smṛtiviṣaye viparyāsa ityarthaḥ,
GSP29udnyku5u:1292: tathāca sa ghaṭa ityutpannāyāṃ smṛtau bhrāmyatastaṃ ghaṭamanubhavāmīti syāt,
GSP29udnyku5u:1296: [ku.5.687] asti ca svapnānubhavasyāpi kasyacit satyatvam, saṃvādāt /
GSP29udnyku5u:1306: [ku.5.688] tathāpi vipakṣe kiṃ bādhakamiti cet- “dve brahmaṇī veditavye” ityādi yogavidhivaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP29udnyku5u:1331: tasmin jñāte sarvamidaṃ jñātaṃ bhavatītyevaṃ vijñāya śrutvaikatānastatparo bhavet /
GSP29udnyku5u:1332: yattedaṃ gīyate- “manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru /
GSP29udnyku5u:1335: suhṛdaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ jñātvā māṃ śāntimṛcchati” iti /
GSP29udnyku5u:1344: tannātha/ tvaritaṃ vidhehi karuṇāṃ yena tvadekāgratām /
GSP29udnyku5u:1345: yāte cetasi nāpnuvāma śataśo yāmyāḥ punaryātanāḥ //19 //
GSP29udnyku5u:1347: no vā tataḥ kimamareśagurorgurustu prīto 'stvanena padapīṭhasamarpitenar (paṇena?280) //20 //
